thread.section_title: Empire Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Heating/cooling
thread.title_full: Heating/cooling - Review of Empire Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jonathan S
title: Heating/cooling
text: Our hvac unit clearly has seen better days, from broken knob to a fan that sounded horrible to the fact that the unit could not cool off the hot room made the space very difficult to sleep in. We stayed two nights and despite very early morning request on the second day, they would not move us as they said they were sold out, I'm sure they had to have a late arrival on Saturday where they could have moved us while attempted a real repair?
